name: Hegemon
aura: Increases Ally C. RATE in All Battles by 19%.

skills.desc:
Attacks 2 times at random.

Each hit has a 35% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Grave's Grasp
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 6: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies.

Places a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns. Also has a 50% chance of placing a [Block Active Skills] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Crippling Cold
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Damage +10%

skills.desc:
Always goes first each Round.

If multiple Hegemons are in battle, the Hegemon with the highest SPD will move first, followed by the next highest, and so on.
skills.name: Fateful Arrival [P]
